data.title: 6 Jason observed a large art sculpture in a
data.meta_description: [Solved] 6 Jason observed a large art sculpture in a local park and wanted to know its height but the sculpture was much taller than he could measure
data.text:
Estimate As Donald stood next to a pole supporting a basketball hoop he noticed that the shadow of the pole was about twice the length of his own shadow If Donald is 5 ft 6 in tall what is a reasonable estimate of the height of the pole

Answered step-by-step

1 answer

Question The height of a flagpole is 3 meters and length of the shadow is 2 meters In the same time the length of the shadow of a tree is 10 meters What is the height of the tree 15 Meters 16 Meters 20 Meters 25 Meters 30 Meters Prev

Answered step-by-step

1 answer

A woman wants to measure the height of a nearby building She places a 6 ft pole in the shadow of the building so that the shadow of the pole is exactly covered by the shadow of the building The total length of the buildings shadow is 167 ft and the pole casts a shadow that is 325 ft long How tall is the building Round your answer to the nearest foot (The figure is not drawn to scale)

Answered step-by-step

1 answer
